revised_title: The Role of Canisters in a System for the Final Disposal of Spent Fuel or High-Level Waste
tldr: This article discusses the role of canisters in a system for the final disposal of spent fuel or high-level waste. It presents the Swedish research on a repository 500 meters deep in crystalline rock, focusing on the canister's safety effect and comparing it with other barriers available in a repository system. The study concludes that a combined protection effect of natural and man-made barriers can be achieved, providing a safe and long-term solution for radioactive waste management.
